name: UIPopoverBackgroundViewMethods
desc: A set of methods that UIPopoverBackgroundView subclasses must implement.

items.name: static func contentViewInsets() -> UIEdgeInsets
items.desc: The insets for the content portion of the popover.

items.name: static func arrowBase() -> CGFloat
items.desc: The width of the arrow triangle at its base.

items.name: static func arrowHeight() -> CGFloat
items.desc: The height of the arrow (measured in points) from its base to its tip.
